message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $200. Let me know if you're interested!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. I can see that you're interested in the product, but I need to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I can offer it to you for $180. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $150. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
